user.title: Add Hyena E-Bike
user.description: Select your Hyena E-Bike device or enter its Bluetooth address manually.

confirm.title: Hyena E-Bike Discovered
confirm.description:

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Make sure it is powered on and in range.

abort.not_supported: This device is not a Hyena E-Bike.
